*Yes!* -M- it is Higuchi Ichiyo...I wasn't [sure] because I figure 
that people had the same name...so many people have "ichi" in the 
name I noticed ... the fact that this female novelist lived in the 
same neighborhood as Fujita Goro was mentioned at 
http://hajime3.hp.infoseek.co.jp/cgi-bin/bbs_06/bbs_06.cgi


--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Hirotada Tokugawa" <patriot014@h...> 
wrote:
> 
> 
> >Topic = "Saito 1 and the Yamaguchi house." The relation of Saito 1
> >(Saito Hajime) and Higuchi 1" <<< who is this Higuchi 1?  Does
> >anyone know?
> 
> Could be Higuchi Ichiyo (hence the "1"), a roughly contemporary 
woman 
> writer. I wouldn't be surprised if the two of them had met.
> 
> --M.
